radiographic_examinations.findings: patchy opacities in the right lower and middle lobes
perihilar nodule measuring 1.3 cm by 1.0 cm in the right lower lobe with enlarged right paratracheal lymph nodes and ground-glass opacities in the right lower lobe
uptake of 18F-fluorodeoxyglucose in the right-lower-lobe lung nodule and perihilar, paratracheal, and prevascular lymph nodes
a focus of enhancement, 6 mm in diameter, at the medial inferior left cerebellum
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: repeat MRI of the head 2 months later showed multiple, new, punctate, enhancing foci with low diffusivity throughout the brain parenchyma, findings consistent with metastatic disease
